description:
High school student Yuri Honjou finds herself lost in an “abnormal space” where countless skyscrapers are connected by suspension bridges and “masked figures” mercilessly slaughter their confused and fleeing victims. To survive in this hellish world, she has two choices: kill the masked figures or be killed. Yuri is determined to survive in order to destroy this irrational world, but what will be her ultimate fate?

(Source: Netflix)
synonyms: หน้ากากเดนนรก

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

tags.name: Death Game
tags.description: Features characters participating in a game, where failure results in death.

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Suicide
tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Dissociative Identities
tags.description: A case where one or more people share the same body.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

alternative: 力タナの仮面 (Katana no Kamen)

name.native: ワイト フェザー仮面

node.description:
__Machida Touko__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter and series composer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakuribo)

[Website](http://www.empire-official.com/)

EMPiRE is an idol group formed on August 23, 2017. It was formed by WACK and avex, is known formerly as Project aW, and features members from the WACK auditions earlier in the year.

**Robert Buchholz** is an American producer, voice actor, script/screenwriter, story editor, and voice director. He has produced voices for anime and video games. Robert is the owner of Spliced Bread Productions.

**[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/megblz/)**

**Megan Buchholz** is an American actress, dialogue director and script/screenwriter for anime.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/thereubeh)

Manager, Netflix Originals at SDI Media.
Dialogue Editor for film and television. Based in Los Angeles and works at SDI Media.
